is used to assign a value to a free variable. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

h1. format

<pre><code>["assign-free", <FIXME>, <opecodes_next>]</code></pre>

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>(let ((a "a"))
  (let ()
    (set! a "aa")))</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[frame
   [constant "a"
   [argument
   [constant 1
   [argument
   [close 0
      [box 0
      [constant 0
      [argument
      [refer-local 0
      [argument
      [close 1
         [constant "aa"
         [assign-free 0
         [return]]]
         [shift 0
         [apply]]
      -1]]]]]]
      [apply]
   -1]]]]]
halt]</code></pre>
